Wednus Darwin Documentation

Version

0.1.0

Introduction

Wednus Darwin is the set of implementations of the Darwinian revolution workspace components; time, place, and creaures. Wednus Darwin is a mothod kit loads up followings classes and class extensions:
  • W.Oracle class - The Oracle introduces the concept of time to the objects with the receptor method.: .tick()
  • W.World class - The World provides a creatures' workspace where they interact each other.
  • W.Creature class - The Creature defines a prototype of common creature residing in a world.
  • instructions.js - It contains the set of instructions defines the behavior of the Creature reacting given stimuli. (e.g. meet other creature)

Architecture

Usage

<head> .....
<script type='text/javascript' src='<installation path>/wednus.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
W.module('darwin');
</script>
..... </head>
we  don't  use toilet paper; we use our bare hands.
